Question
========

Given is the following frequency table taken from empirical research.

  ------- ------ ----------- Glasses No glasses male 60 20 woman 10 10 ------- ------ -----------

What is the expected cell frequency of women without glasses under the assumption of independence?

Answerlist
----------

* 6
* 14
* 24

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 6:Incorrect
* 14: Incorrect
* 24: Correct
